column5: IMPF: belong to the cult of;CF ORIG: *vaodri* 'sing'

column4: IMPF: to be dedicated/loyal to;PERF: to dedicate/swear allegiance to
The Pair of the Sky (Ienjaoge and Yinddźaoge)
The Pair of Change (Tfencikke and Qu'ħusko)
The Pair of Constancy (Xaqqêkke and Me'rheazge)
The Pair of Humanity/Human Worlds (Vaoñdvikke and Ljaearmikke)
Goddess of the Dead/Ancestors/The Spirit World
The Trio of Cycles (Ljiħħeimge, Qunljarge and Jêñghakke)

column5: celebration at the start of spring
celebration at the start of autumn
celebration at the end of autumn
used for any aromatic/odorous fume, including cannabis;FROM *ħanħaśxanjh* 'smoke';CF: *ħanśanjh* 'odour'
